alert.note: Alert for Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued March 08 at 5:58AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 8 AM... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from heavy rainfall WHERE...Tutuila and Aunu`u WHEN...Through 8 AM IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 558 TAEAO ASO LULU MATI 8 2023 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 8 I LE TAEAI... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai timuga mamafa NOFOAGA...Tutuila, Aunu`u TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 8 i le taeao AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono tutupu sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le palapala ua iai nei. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.
